ParentSquare

ParentSquare is a comprehensive communications platform that offers enhanced engagement features, including a user-friendly mobile app, two-way language translation, and more!

Sign in to ParentSquare or download the ParentSquare mobile app to your phone, and choose whether to receive push notifications, get automatic language translations for messages, and more. Download in iOS here, or download in Android here.

In the notifications section, Families will be able to customize their settings to determine how they would like to receive information and can turn on text messaging. Click here for help using Parent Square.

SchoolTool

SSCSD uses SchoolTool as it’s student management system for parents and guardians to access their child(ren)’s grades, attendance, schedule, and other data. Once you have a parent portal account, it is active for the duration your child(ren) attends Saratoga Springs City School District. Please be advised we only issue parent portals to parents and legal guardians (with court papers).

If you have not received an email containing a username and password for the Parent Portal you may request a Parent Portal account by choosing the appropriate link above. If you have children in both buildings, you only need to place a request from one building. Once we have verified the accuracy of the information, you will receive an email with your SchoolTool account username and password.

SchoolTool Login Link

SchoolTool Parent Portal Request & Password Reset Form

SchoolTool Mobile App

The Schooltool mobile application is available to parents/guardians and students who have a schooltool parent portal account and an iOS or Android device. App users can log in to see information about student schedules, assignments and attendance. This app is available for Apple Devices in the App Store and the Google Play Store for Android Devices. View Parent Portal Tutorial for SchoolTool assistance.

Closings and Delays

As the snowy months approach, SSCSD would like to remind you how you will receive notice if school will be operating under a delay or will be closed due to inclement weather.

All cancellations, delays or early dismissals are posted on the school district’s website, right on the homepage of the website. The decision to close or delay the starting time of school will be made as early as possible. School closings are also announced through the media via the School Closing Network (which includes many local TV & radio stations as well as newspaper websites.)

Closing information will also be sent directly to a parents/guardian’s email account and cell phone via text message through Parent Square.
